articles.title: 'A disgrace that weakens Europe’: Anger over MEPs-Qatar corruption scandal - Euronews
articles.description: An anti-corruption investigation involving a Gulf state, reportedly Qatar, and some European Parliament members has shocked the EU assembly, bringing calls for reform.  #EuropeNews
articles.content: The arrest and charging of four people in connection with an anti-corruption investigation involving members of the European Parliament and a Gulf state, said to be Qatar, could shake Brussels to its… [+4401 chars]

articles.author: Anmar Frangoul
articles.title: Rivian pauses plans to make electric vans in Europe with Mercedes-Benz - CNBC
articles.description: Rivian said it remains open to exploring future work with Mercedes-Benz "at a more appropriate time."
articles.content:
Rivian said Monday it was pausing plans to manufacture electric commercial vans in Europe and would "no longer pursue" the agreement it made with Mercedes-Benz just three months ago.
